servinfo.title: Procedure after ECM Replacement
servinfo.ptxt: After ECM is replaced with new one or used one, the transponder code in the transponder built in the ignition key has to be registered with ECM. To register transponder code in the ignition key with ECM, perform “Immobilizer Key Registration” mode of SUZUKI scan tool referring to “SUZUKI scan tool Operator’s Manual”.

attention3.ptxt: A maximum of four transponder codes can be registered with ECM.
